title: LeggyPeggy
cardDesc: A exhilarating and cooperative game where two players take on the roles of a highly advanced robot and a plucky little girl armed with a powerful weapon.
description: LeggyPeggy is an exhilarating and cooperative game where two players take on the roles of a highly advanced robot and a plucky little girl armed with a powerful weapon.

Together, you must use your unique strengths and abilities to overcome challenging parkour obstacles and defeat enemies. With fast-paced gameplay, exciting challenges, and an engaging story, Leggy Peggy is a game that requires communication and cooperation to conquer the track.
Are you ready to join forces with Leggy and Peggy?

title: Soggy Story
cardDesc: Made for Unwrap Game Jam 2023. Steer your little fragile paperboat to safety, to deliver the letter, that it contains.
description: What do you do if you have to send a letter down a river? Make a paperboat out of it!

You are little Oggy. A bug-spirit that wants to help with delivering a very important letter down the river. But there is no rudder, so you have to walk around on the boat to stear it through distributing your weight.

But be careful, because there are many obstacles floating around and your boat is very fragile and may sink if it gets damaged too much. Luckily there are handy stickers floating around the river that you can use to patch up your boat.
Help him deliver the letter c:
This game was made in 2.5 days as a contribution to the DAE Unwrap Jam 2023. The theme was FRAGILE.

title: Coffee in July
cardDesc: Made for AI in Games Summer School 2023 Game Jam. A conversational main character with a real twitter account, tweeting about your gameplay. Respond and you will influence the game.
description: Made for AI in Games Summer School 2023 Game Jam.

The goal of our project was to give the player character the ability to interact with the player. Every in-game day the player plays as the main character on the way to a coffee shop. The main character will tweet about their experience on real twitter. The main character will dream about your responses on twitter and it will influence the comming day, their mood, world and music will change depending on your responses.

Official description: Getting up. Getting coffee. Going for work. Going for tweet. What does she see on the way to coffee? All starts again. (Not) from fresh. If you want to reply her tweet, don't remember to do that before she falls asleep!

title: Diffuseum
cardDesc: Made for AI in Games Summer School 2022 Game Jam. This is a special gallery where the guests inspire the art. There is just one problem, the gallerist forgot to put up the signs!
description: Welcome to the Diffusion Gallery!

This is a special gallery where the guests inspire the art. There is just one problem, the gallerist forgot to put up the signs! Help the gallerist figure out who has inspired the art and put correct sign next to the painting.
Game flow:

Each player types in a prompt they want to generate an image of then that generated image gets sent to the next person who needs to guess what the prompt was. That guess once again gets generated and shown to the next player to guess again. This goes on for a couple of rounds and by the end you have a history of promts and images to show the players. This can get to some very funny results even with bad image generation quality.
Made for AI in Games Summer School 2022 Game Jam.

title: 2D Engine with Bomberman
description: I made my own 2D engine, mainly to familiarize myself with programming patterns common in video game development.
features:
- Entity Component System
- Game Loop
- Input processing
- Sound Service
- SDL rendering

title: Spelunky Remake
description: This game was made in a C++ framework provided by my school, it only has basic functionality like a game loop, functions to draw on screen and basic math functions.
